column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/98ab2b5a265e4794d6a9d22212d992bfd1f9c1f1 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

May be handle the problem immediately, ie do an return error("...") here\n(though I suppose when the file is too short, it will fail later anyway when doing `filein >> hashIn`, so it may not matter apart from clarity)\n
